data.eml:eml: Host plants of Empria sawflies (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) in Japan include Rhododendron (Ericaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shinohara, Akihiko, Hara, Hideho, Prous, Marko (2015): Host plants of Empria sawflies (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) in Japan include Rhododendron (Ericaceae). Zootaxa 4007 (1): 143-148, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.1.13
